objects.text: Multiple Cycles • Digital Display • Energy Efficient • Compact Design
Perfect for apartments and small homes

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Compact Ventless Dryer - Modern Digital Control
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek white design with modern digital display and intuitive control panel
• 🔄 Multiple drying cycles including My Cycle, Mixed Load, Heavy Duty, and Towels
• 📱 LED digital display showing time remaining and cycle status
• 🌡️ Advanced temperature control with various heat settings
• 🚪 Large capacity drum with spacious door opening for easy loading/unloading
• ⚡ Energy-efficient ventless condensing technology
• 🔧 Easy-access maintenance panel and built-in cleaning reminder
• 📏 Space-saving compact design perfect for apartments and small homes
• 🔊 Sound alert when cycle completes
• ⚙️ Multiple fabric care options with adjustable drying preferences

banner_details:
The banner showcases a sleek promotional layout for a household appliance, centered around a high-contrast and clean design. At the top, a bold and prominent heading (`heading`) grabs attention, supported by a visually elegant tagline (`tagline`) in a modern font. The central focus of the banner is a high-resolution product image (`product_image`), laying front and center against a soft, vertically blended blue gradient background with large translucent circles for visual interest.

Below the product, the feature highlights (`features`) are presented with impactful bullet-pointed descriptors, followed by a brief value statement (`description`) to emphasize usage scenarios. The price (`price`) is large and bold, making the cost immediately noticeable, while the bottom contains a solid call-to-action button (`cta_button`) labeled with compelling text (`cta`).

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: `#095B96`
- Steel Blue: `#2E7DB3`
- Light Sky Blue: `#B7D9F2`
- Pale Ice Blue: `#E8F4FC`
- White: `#FFFFFF`

The banner blends a modern gradient aesthetic with practical layout hierarchy—ideal for ecommerce promotions while ensuring visual clarity and product focus.
product_color: The product image, showcasing a modern Insignia dryer, uses a clean and minimalistic color palette centered around white (#FFFFFF), black (#000000), and steel gray (#D8D8D8). The main body is a bright white, creating a sense of hygiene and sleekness, ideal for appliance marketing. The door and trim feature glossy black, which contrasts sharply with the white, drawing attention to the central functionality area. Accents of subtle blue (#6CA6CD), red (#E94B35), and orange (#F28C28) on the control panel provide visual interest and emphasize functionality without overpowering the minimalist aesthetic. These colors blend harmoniously while creating clear focal highlights for usability.
